name: Very Affordable & Cozy Room with Airbed!
description:
My place is close to the Red Line Train "Fields Corner" and the Purple Commuter Line.. Youâ€™ll love my place because of the location.. My place is good for business travelers.

The space
This Private Room comes with an Airbed, closet, lamp, desk & chair and AC to keep unit nice and cool all summer long. In addition, All common areas are shared w/ students and/or professionals.
Laundromat, Cleaners, Food/Market Shops are near by.
House Distance from T: 5-10 mins walk to train station.
Train Rides: 15 min to Downtown Boston, 20 to MIT

Guest access
Guest can access all common areas!

Other things to note
1) Please state your "Full Name" and the "Purpose of your Stay" when making your inquiry.
2) Area is safe
3) There is also "Free Street Parking" 24 hours, No Resident Permit required.
NO Parking (between 12 pm-4 pm) on Street Cleaning Day, on the 3rd Wednesday and Thursday of the month.
